Enrichment of aerobic taxa in supragingival plaque - WMS

Source: vignettes/articles/subgingival_plaque.Rmd
subgingival_plaque.Rmd
library(bugphyzzAnalyses)
library(MicrobiomeBenchmarkData)
library(bugphyzz)
library(taxPPro)
library(EnrichmentBrowser)
dat_name <- 'HMP_2012_WMS_gingival'
tse <- getBenchmarkData(dat_name, dryrun = FALSE)[[1]]
taxa_names <- gsub('_', ' ', rownames(tse))
taxa_ids_file <- system.file(
    'extdata/taxa_info_wms.tsv', package = 'bugphyzzAnalyses'
)
taxa_ids_df <- 
    read.table(taxa_ids_file, header = TRUE, row.names = 1, sep = '\t')
taxids <- taxa_ids_df[taxa_names,]
names(taxids) <- taxa_names
rowData(tse)$taxon_name <- rownames(tse)
rowData(tse)$NCBI_ID <- taxids
rownames(tse) <- taxids
tse_subset <- filterTaxa(tse)
tse_subset
#> class: TreeSummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 189 16 
#> metadata(0):
#> assays(1): counts
#> rownames(189): 1318 39778 ... 305719 556499
#> rowData names(10): kingdom phylum ... taxon_name NCBI_ID
#> colnames(16): SRS013949 SRS013950 ... SRS063215 SRS065310
#> colData names(24): dataset subject_id ... curator BMI
#> reducedDimNames(0):
#> mainExpName: NULL
#> altExpNames(0):
#> rowLinks: a LinkDataFrame (189 rows)
#> rowTree: 1 phylo tree(s) (10430 leaves)
#> colLinks: NULL
#> colTree: NULL

Get annotations 

aer <- physiologies('aerophilicity')[[1]]
aer_plus <- aer |> 
    propagate()

Get signatures 

attribute_names <- c(
    'aerobic', 'anaerobic', 'facultatively anaerobic'
)
aer_sig <- getSignatures(aer, tax.id.type = 'NCBI_ID', tax.level = 'species')

x_regex <- paste0('(', paste0(attribute_names, collapse = '|'), ')')

aer_sig <- aer_sig[grep(x_regex, attribute_names)]
aer_sig <- lapply(aer_sig, as.character)

aer_plus <- aer_plus[!is.na(aer_plus$Attribute_type),]
aer_plus_sig <- 
    getSignatures(aer_plus, tax.id.type = 'NCBI_ID', tax.level = 'species')
aer_plus_sig <- aer_plus_sig[grep(x_regex, attribute_names)]
aer_plus_sig <- lapply(aer_plus_sig, as.character)
df <- data.frame(
    aer = vapply(aer_sig, length, integer(1)),
    aer_plus = vapply(aer_plus_sig, length, integer(1))
)
df
#>                                                 aer aer_plus
#> bugphyzz:aerophilicity|aerobic                 3420    10592
#> bugphyzz:aerophilicity|anaerobic                281     1519
#> bugphyzz:aerophilicity|facultatively anaerobic  352     1772
mean(rownames(tse_subset) %in% aer$NCBI_ID) * 100
#> [1] 58.20106

Better completeness with asr/inheritance propagation

mean(rownames(tse_subset) %in% aer_plus$NCBI_ID) * 100
#> [1] 70.37037
colData(tse_subset)$GROUP <- 
    ifelse(colData(tse_subset)$body_subsite == 'subgingival_plaque', 0, 1)
da_res <- deAna(expr = tse_subset, de.method = 'DESeq2')
#> Excluding 54 genes not satisfying min.cpm threshold
da_res
#> class: TreeSummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 135 16 
#> metadata(0):
#> assays(1): counts
#> rownames(135): 1318 39778 ... 53418 39950
#> rowData names(14): kingdom phylum ... PVAL ADJ.PVAL
#> colnames(16): SRS013949 SRS013950 ... SRS063215 SRS065310
#> colData names(25): dataset subject_id ... BMI GROUP
#> reducedDimNames(0):
#> mainExpName: NULL
#> altExpNames(0):
#> rowLinks: a LinkDataFrame (135 rows)
#> rowTree: 1 phylo tree(s) (10430 leaves)
#> colLinks: NULL
#> colTree: NULL
enrich_res <- 
    sbea(method = 'ora', se = da_res, gs = aer_sig, alpha = 0.05, perm = 0)
gsRanking(enrich_res, signif.only = TRUE)
#> DataFrame with 1 row and 4 columns
#>                 GENE.SET  NR.GENES NR.SIG.GENES      PVAL
#>              <character> <numeric>    <numeric> <numeric>
#> 1 bugphyzz:aerophilici..        26            8   0.00245
enrich_res <- 
    sbea(method = 'ora', se = da_res, gs = aer_plus_sig, alpha = 0.05, perm = 0)
gsRanking(enrich_res, signif.only = TRUE)
#> DataFrame with 1 row and 4 columns
#>                 GENE.SET  NR.GENES NR.SIG.GENES      PVAL
#>              <character> <numeric>    <numeric> <numeric>
#> 1 bugphyzz:aerophilici..        32            9  0.000877
